event.event-label: IBM: IBM-Director-Alert-MIB defined trap event: trapText1
event.descr:
Converted Tivoli Director Event

trapType %parm[#1]%;

trapSeverity %parm[#2]%;

trapSenderName %parm[#3]%;

trapManagedObjectName %parm[#4]%;

trapText %parm[#5]%;

trapCategory %parm[#6]%;
event.logmsg: IBM: Director Trap Received: %parm[#1]%

event.descr:
Informational: No controllers were found in this system.

ibmServeRaidTrapServerName %parm[#1]%;
event.logmsg: IBM ServeRaid: ibmServeRaidNoControllers trap received ibmServeRaidTrapServerName=%parm[#1]%

event.descr:
Error: Commands not responding on Controller %d.

ibmServeRaidTrapServerName %parm[#1]%;

ibmServeRaidTrapController %parm[#2]%;
event.logmsg: IBM ServeRaid: ibmServeRaidControllerFail trap received ibmServeRaidTrapServerName=%parm[#1]% ibmServeRaidTrapController=%parm[#2]%

event.descr:
Error: The battery-backup cache device on Controller %d needs a new battery.

ibmServeRaidTrapServerName %parm[#1]%;

ibmServeRaidTrapController %parm[#2]%;
event.logmsg: IBM ServeRaid: ibmServeRaidDeadBattery trap received ibmServeRaidTrapServerName=%parm[#1]% ibmServeRaidTrapController=%parm[#2]%

event.descr:
Error: The battery-backup cache device on Controller %d is defective %d

ibmServeRaidTrapErrorCode %parm[#3]%;

event.descr:
Error: Cannot read controller configuration.

Informational: Controller %d failover detected. Passive controller is now active.

event.descr:
Warning: Controller %d version mismatch detected. The BIOS, Firmware, and Driver are not a matched set and are not compatible.

ibmServeRaidTrapController %parm[#2]%;

event.descr:
On systems with no Remote Supervisor Adapter, this event is sent when the state of a system's hard file space has changed with respect to user-defined levels of percentage hard file space remaining. On systems with a Remote Supervisor Adapter, this event is sent when the system has experienced a DASD controller failure.

event.descr:
This event is sent when the Remote Supervisor Adapter detects that its error log is 75% full and/or 100% full.

iBMPSGErrorLogEventIdentifier %parm[#1]%;

iBMPSGErrorLogEventSourceObjectPath %parm[#2]%;

iBMPSGErrorLogEventTargetObjectPath %parm[#3]%;

iBMPSGErrorLogEventSeverity %parm[#4]%;

iBMPSGErrorLogEventdescription %parm[#5]%;

iBMPSGErrorLogEventTimeStamp %parm[#6]%;
event.logmsg: IBM UMS Event: iBMPSGErrorLogEvent trap received iBMPSGErrorLogEventIdentifier=%parm[#1]% iBMPSGErrorLogEventSourceObjectPath=%parm[#2]% iBMPSGErrorLogEventTargetObjectPath=%parm[#3]% iBMPSGErrorLogEventSeverity=%parm[#4]% iBMPSGErrorLogEventdescription=%parm[#5]% iBMPSGErrorLogEventTimeStamp=%parm[#6]%

event.descr:
This event is sent when the state of the Remote Supervisor Adapter changes with respect to security because a user has logged into it.

iBMPSGRemoteLoginEventIdentifier %parm[#1]%;

iBMPSGRemoteLoginEventSourceObjectPath %parm[#2]%;

iBMPSGRemoteLoginEventTargetObjectPath %parm[#3]%;

iBMPSGRemoteLoginEventSeverity %parm[#4]%;

iBMPSGRemoteLoginEventdescription %parm[#5]%;

iBMPSGRemoteLoginEventTimeStamp %parm[#6]%;
event.logmsg: IBM UMS Event: iBMPSGRemoteLoginEvent trap received iBMPSGRemoteLoginEventIdentifier=%parm[#1]% iBMPSGRemoteLoginEventSourceObjectPath=%parm[#2]% iBMPSGRemoteLoginEventTargetObjectPath=%parm[#3]% iBMPSGRemoteLoginEventSeverity=%parm[#4]% iBMPSGRemoteLoginEventdescription=%parm[#5]% iBMPSGRemoteLoginEventTimeStamp=%parm[#6]%

event.descr:
A problem has been added to a problem log on a converged power system.

%parm[#1]%
event.logmsg: Problem log trap received from a Converged Power System
